string-array.name: help_A
string-array.item: Tips: First unplug the player from the car lighter hole, insert it again. Open the mobile Bluetooth after closing it around 10 seconds. Click to search the player again.
Tips: Insert the player into the car lighter hole again after power off. Click to search and connect it again.
Tips: Click Car charger with Bluetooth on the APP homepage; Click FM Sending Frequency. Set up the sending frequency of player. Adjust the car FM to the set frequency
Tips: Open the APP. Select the player you like.
Tips: Set the Roidmi Driver APP in the mobile system as protected background application. For your reference, enter mobile settings; click protected background applications; select Roidmi Driver APP.
Tips: Click Car charger with Bluetooth on the APP homepage; Close the Automatically play while starting the car.
Tips: Click the icon on the upper right corner of the homepage; Click the settings and close the Voice Prompt.
Tips: Click Car charger with Bluetooth on the APP homepage; Click the Setting Indicator and select corresponding color.
"Tips: Make sure the audio player being re-connected; Close the guide page of the audio player if it's the updated software."
Tips: Our hardware control protocol does not support the software. We recommend you to use such audio players as KuGoo, TTPOD, KUWO, QQ Music etc.
Tips：App offers shaking function(exchange music, voice recognition),exchanging music acquiescently. Shaking your phone when music playing, it will play next music after prompt tone kaka
"Tips: Try to re-open the Bluetooth of the mobile phone and search the audio player after a while if the Roidmi Music Blue C can't be found but powered on already."
Tips: Close the undesired Bluetooth of the mobile phone bounded to the audio player nearby, and start to search the audio player with the desired mobile phone.
Tips: Re-boot the mobile phone and open the Roidmi Driver APP.
Tips: Clean the ash from the car lighter hole if any.
Tips: Adjust the frequency of APP to the same one of the car FM.
Tips: Since strong FM signal may interfere with weak one, we recommend you with three local unoccupied frequencies.

"Tips: Perhaps it's not the best choice of frequency we recommend you in your city. You'd better manually increase or decrease the frequency of 0.1MHz FM to a radio frequency without interference, meanwhile adjust the mobile phone APP to the same frequency. If it works well after a period of time, you are welcome to share the frequency of your city with us in the feedback of about menu. We will recommend to the people in the same city of yours while we update the software."
